Package org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.configuration

Class OpenAPIConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.framework.rodolfo.freire.git.bank.authorize.configuration.OpenAPIConfiguration
@Configuration public class OpenAPIConfiguration extends Object
This class configures and returns a custom OpenAPI instance for integration with Swagger. It uses the settings defined in PropertiesBankAuthorize to populate the necessary information for API documentation and the associated server.

The configuration ensures that the Swagger documentation is populated with details such as the API's title, description, version, contact information, license, terms of service, and server details.

This setup is crucial for providing a comprehensive and user-friendly API documentation interface that integrates seamlessly with Swagger's UI and other tools.

  • Method Details

    • customOpenAPI

      @Bean public io.swagger.v3.oas.models.OpenAPI customOpenAPI()
      Method responsible for creating and configuring a custom OpenAPI instance.

      The OpenAPI instance is configured with information such as the API's title, description, version, contact details, license information, terms of service URL, and server information.

      Returns:
      OpenAPI instance configured with the information defined in PropertiesBankAuthorize.
